text: Hi Jane, hope you're doing well. I was wondering if you could share some insights on the challenges the kids are facing? It would really help us shape the New Roots Support Network to better assist them.
I'm compiling a list of resources for the New Roots Support Network. Do you think you could contribute some of your experiences?
Jane, your expertise would be invaluable to our project. The children's well-being is our top priority.
We're meeting this Saturday to discuss the network's framework. Your input would be great, Jane!
